verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G3700>appeared<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>wonder<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>; a <S%G1135>woman<s%> clothed <S%G4016>with<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4582>moon<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3769>tail<s%> <S%G4951>drew<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of the <S%G792>stars<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> did <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> which was <S%G3195>ready<s%> to be <S%G5088>delivered<s%>, <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2719>devour<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> as soon <S%G3752>as<s%> it was <S%G5088>born<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> she brought <S%G5088>forth<s%> a <S%G730>man<s%> <S%G5207>child<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> is <S%G3195>to<s%> <S%G4165>rule<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> was caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2362>throne<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G5343>fled<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>, <S%G3699>where<s%> she <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G5142>feed<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> and <S%G1835>sixty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1404>dragon<s%> was cast <S%G906>out<s%>, that <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G3789>serpent<s%>, <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G1228>Devil<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%>, which <S%G4105>deceives<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world<s%>: he was cast <S%G906>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> were cast <S%G906>out<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G737>Now<s%> is <S%G1096>come<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1411>strength<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G2725>accuser<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> is cast <S%G2598>down<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2723>accused<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G3528>overcame<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5590>lives<s%> <S%G891>to<s%> the <S%G2288>death<s%>.

<S%G1223%G99999>Therefore<s%> <S%G2165>rejoice<s%>, you <S%G3772>heavens<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>you<s%> that <S%G4637>live<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>. <S%G3759>Woe<s%> to the <S%G2730>inhabiters<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%>! <S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> is come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2372>wrath<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> he knows <S%G1492>that<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> but a <S%G3641>short<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, he <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> brought <S%G5088>forth<s%> the man <S%G730>child<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> to the <S%G1135>woman<s%> were <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4420>wings<s%> of a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G105>eagle<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> she might <S%G4072>fly<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>, <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>, <S%G3699>where<s%> she is <S%G5142>nourished<s%> <S%G1563>for<s%> a <S%G2540>time<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2540>times<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2255>half<s%> a <S%G2540>time<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G3789>serpent<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> cast <S%G906>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G4215>flood<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G3778>her<s%> to be carried away by the <S%G4216>flood<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G997>helped<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> swallowed <S%G2666>up<s%> the <S%G4215>flood<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> cast <S%G906>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> was <S%G3710>angry<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G3062>remnant<s%> of <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
